items.summary: Replace the existing SwiftOps logo with a new premium futuristic eagle head logo featuring minimalistic geometric design, sharp angular edges and wings, aggressive but clean tech aesthetic, neon cyan glow matching the website theme, high-contrast white with neon cyan accents, avoiding any cartoon or mascot style

Add a smooth 2-4 second entrance animation to the eagle logo when the website loads, featuring fade-in and scale-in effects with a slight glow pulse, using smooth easing for a premium feel, ensuring the animation runs only once on page load and the logo appears instantly without delay after animation completes, optimized for both desktop and mobile performance

Fix the header alignment of the contact email (zeeshan.automation06@gmail.com) to display fully in a single line without text wrapping or breaking on smaller screens, with proper vertical alignment relative to navbar items, and maintaining equal spacing between logo, menu items, and contact details across mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports

Optimize the header layout for responsive design ensuring perfect alignment across all devices with no overlapping elements, consistent padding and spacing, and maintaining the professional SaaS/AI startup appearance on mobile, tablet, and desktop screens

Optimize performance by compressing the logo asset for fast loading, ensuring the logo animation does not delay page rendering, and maintaining smooth scrolling and navigation speed throughout the website
